body:
A possible solution: Modify the change made in https://github.com/doctrine/dbal/pull/4590 but call `$params['pdo']->setAttribute(\PDO::ATTR_STATEMENT_CLASS, [PDODriverStatement::class, []]);` inside the `Doctrine\DBAL\Connection` class instead of the `Doctrine\DBAL\DriverManager` class. Thoughts?

This is basically what I did as a temporary fix (call the `setAttribute()` code before passing into `Connection`), but I'm not sure if design-wise there's a reason it wasn't added inside `Connection` in the previous fix.
I Can confirm same issue with custom PDO.

We have the same  problem when using when using https://github.com/crate/crate-dbal implementation which is build on top of https://github.com/crate/crate-pdo which errors with following message:

```
  Argument 1 passed to Doctrine\DBAL\Connection::ensureForwardCompatibilitySt  
  atement() must be an instance of Doctrine\DBAL\Driver\ResultStatement, inst  
  ance of Crate\PDO\PDOStatement given, called in /vendor/doctrine/dbal/lib/Doctrine/DBAL/Connection.php on line 1314     
  ```

issue.title: Move fix for user provided pdo connection
Incompatibility to current doctrine/dbal 2.13.*

repository.name: crate-dbal
repository.description: Doctrine Database Access Layer for Crate.IO

issue.body:
It seems like that the crate connection does not implement the dbal `Connection` interface and so currently failing. For dbal 2.13.* (2.12.* works). See comment by @mdumoulin here https://github.com/doctrine/dbal/issues/4619#issuecomment-827900550.

EDIT: Seems like correct interface is used  over the [ServerInfoAwareInterface](https://github.com/crate/crate-dbal/blob/751f3b78f949c97eda15adc0254308e9d7944eed/src/Crate/DBAL/Driver/PDOCrate/PDOConnection.php#L28) but the false statement class is set for PDO.

issue.title: Fix compatibility to dbal 2.13 by defining the statement class

body: @mdumoulin  Thx for the response. The Connection interface is used over the ServerInfoAwareInterface. I hope crate pdo support that attribute for the statement, tried to fix it in there [repository](https://github.com/crate/crate-dbal/pull/113/files).

issue.title: ensureForwardCompatibilityStatement expects ResultStatement, given PDOStatement
